name: Spirits of the Wisps
description:
Welcome to Spirits of the Wisps !

A tower defense where you play little elemental towers against angry forest spirits,

Jump into this cartoon fantasy world and enjoy your journey!

This game was made as a first year school project who lasted 3 weeks,

with 2 game designers, 4  3D graphic designers and 1  graphic designers

Jeremy Van Den Burg (GD) :https://jeremy-van-den-burg.itch.io/

Matthias Khetib (GD) :https://kavi29.itch.io/

Alex Melu (3D)

Arina Yakovleva (3D) :https://lazy-lizardoo.itch.io/

Eloise clabaux (3D) :https://eloiseclbx.itch.io/

Eve Meriah (3D) :https://deaahli.itch.io/

Ricardo Soriano (2D)

(the game will be available in the browser soon, but I need to optimize it first)
